Runepowder and the Modern Gnome was a tome that contained a treatise on the recreation of the mythical runepowder, penned sometime in or before the late 15 century DR.
This extremely wordy tome collected lore and gnomish legends regarding the mythical and deadly explosive substance called runepowder. It also presented a possibility of the lost substances recreation by the modern gnomish masters. The book also mused on such seemingly random topics as the space-time environment and the thought-behavior-action philosophy.
In the , a copy of Runepowder and the Modern Gnome belonged to Gyldro Angleiron the Smith and the proprietor of Rivington General in the Rivington district of Baldurs Gate.
